review: Has a lot  of older movies that are free with amazon prime
author: dean english

review: Where have you been all my life. Best purchase / gift in years!!  Wish there was a bundle package where you could get all the subscriptions for a reduced price.
author: Jason Hodge

review: Love having Netflix and Amazin wherever I go
author: Timothy W. Crawford

review: Allows a non-wifi TV to access Prime, Netflix, etc. Seems like we are increasingly experiencing issues with the video lagging on the audio, or freezing and then jumping to catch up with the audio. Because of that, I can only give 3 stars. Have had this for over 6 months.
author: Kat

review: What is not to love about this device? It is extremely affordable and turns any TV into a smart TV. The interface is nice and easy to use as well for Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, HBO GO and a few other things.
author: mommyinthecity

review: Cannot get the fire stick to work.  Any help?
author: Patricia E. Henry
